entries.name: Runic Bruiser
entries: Sometimes all you need is nothing but a fist and being able to apply it to a face. The mightier the fist, the better the punch, so why not make it magical? That's why you're an Runic Bruiser, able to deliver the most devastating hits and spells with nothing but your hands.

You gain the {@feat Arcane Fists|SoM} magus feat for free and your fists gain the {@trait two-hand d8} trait, allowing you to increase the damage of your fists as long as both of your hands are unoccupied.

When you're in {@action Arcane Cascade|SoM} stance, your fists gain the {@trait parry}, {@trait shove} and {@trait trip} traits. If you use both hands to parry, your circumstance bonus to AC increases to +2. If you have the {@feat Spell Parry|SoM} feat, you also add this circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells that target you.

subclassFeature.name: Studious Spells
entries: {@b Runic Bruiser} 7th: {@spell blur}; 11th: {@spell vampiric touch}; 13th: {@spell countless eyes|apg}

spell.name: Knocking Jab
entries: You temporarily quicken your strikes, catching your enemy off-guard. Make a melee {@action Strike} with your fist or unarmed weapon. You can then {@action Grapple}, {@action Shove}, or {@action Trip} the target of your {@action Strike}. Your multiple attack penalty applies to both of these actions as normal.

spell.name: Summon Sharknado

plus_x.entry: Increase the Arrival damage by {@damage 1d6} and Departure damage by {@damage 1d4}.

entries: You call upon the power of mighty water elementals, summoning the Sharknado. The Sharknado manifests as a {@trait Large} turqoise whirlwind made out of water. It has a speed of 30 feet.
{@b Arrive} The Sharknado arrives in a splash of freezing water, dealing {@damage 3d6} cold damage. All enemy creatures within a 25-foot emanation must attempt basic Fortitude saves.

{@b Depart} ({@trait attack}) The Sharknado releases a torrent of conjured sharks upon your foes. Make one ranged spell attack roll against each enemy within a 25-foot emanation. These attacks deal cold damage equal to {@damage 3d4} plus your spellcasting ability modifier. Roll the damage only once for all targets.
Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but do not increase your penalty until you have made all your attacks.

duration.entry: until the end of your next turn

spell.name: Silvery Barbs
spell.trigger: A creature within range succeeds on an attack roll, skill check or saving throw.
spell.targets: the triggering creature, another creature within range
entries: You magically disrupt the triggering creature and turn its momentary uncertainty into encouragement for another creature. The creature must reroll the triggering check, and must use the worse result; this is a {@trait misfortune} effect.
You select another creature within range. On its next attack roll, skill check or saving throw, it can roll twice and use the better result; this is a {@trait fortune} effect.

feat.name: Hexing Spellstrike
feat.prerequisites: {@class Magus|SoM|runic bruiser|runic bruiser|CoLegerdemains} hybrid study, {@action Spellstrike|SoM}
entries: You spew magic-imbued swears and curses while you attack a foe. Make a melee {@action Spellstrike|SoM} with your fist or unarmed weapon and {@action Demoralize} the target of your {@action Strike}. Do this immediately before making the {@action Strike}, but after choosing your target. The {@action Demoralize} action gains the {@trait arcane} and {@trait enchantment} traits, and it always has the basic effects of a {@action Demoralize}, rather than applying any adjustments or alternate effects from other feats or abilities.

feat.name: Quick Maker
entries: You master the basics, allowing you to make items in a short amount of time. When {@action Craft||Crafting} an item, you reduce the number of downtime days required to craft the item by 1 for each level by which your level exceeds the item's level, to a minimum of 1 day.

item.name: Goggles of Revealing
entries: These brass goggles have thick and almost ethereal purple lenses adjustable by gold and silvery nubs. While worn, they give you a +1 item bonus to {@action Identify Magic} checks to identify magical items and objects.

The goggles also allow you to cast the {@spell Detect Magic} and {@spell Read Aura} cantrips as arcane innate spells. When casting {@spell Detect Magic} this way, you send out a pulse in a 60-foot cone, rather than the usual 30-foot emanation.
The item bonus is +2. The {@spell Detect Magic} cantrip is heightened to 3rd-level.

entries.with: usual 30-foot emanation, and the cantrip is heightened to 3rd-level.

entries: The item bonus is +3. The {@spell Detect Magic} cantrip is heightened to 4th-level.

entries.with: usual 30-foot emanation, and the cantrip is heightened to 4th-level.
